Utilities¶

Submodules¶

kale.utils.csv_logger module¶

Logging functions, including saving results from multiple runs to CSV, from https://github.com/criteo-research/pytorch-ada/blob/master/adalib/ada/utils/experimentation.py and https://github.com/criteo-research/pytorch-ada/blob/master/adalib/ada/utils/experimentation_results.py

class kale.utils.csv_logger.XpResults(metrics, df=None)¶

Bases: object

Parameters

  • metrics (list of string) – Which metrics to record.

  • df (pandas.DataFrame, optional) – columns are: metrics + [seed, method, split].

  • to None. (Defaults) –

kale.utils.csv_logger.record_hashes(hash_file, hash_, value)¶

Record the hash and assoicated (training) parameters

Parameters

  • hash_file (string) – the (json) file for recording hash info

  • hash (hash) – the hash

  • value (dictionary) – the (unique parameter) setting

kale.utils.csv_logger.setup_logger(train_params, output_dir, method_name, seed)¶

[summary]

Parameters

  • train_params (dictionary) – training parameters to generate a unique hash for logging

  • output_dir (string) – the path to log results

  • method_name (string) – the ML method

Returns

[description] logger (logging): a logger for logging results results (kale.utils.csv_logger.XpResults): csv logger checkpoint_callback (pytorch_lightning.callbacks.ModelCheckpoint): for callback test_csv_file (string): the unique csv file to log results for a fixed set of training

parameters for different methods

Return type

[type]
